DOC.brief_summary: This study perform assess influence intraarticular injection 2ml Diprospan ( wich contain 4mg Betamethasone sodium phosphate 10mg Betamethasone dipropionate ) osteoarthritic knee patient undergo total knee replacement contralateral knee . The study population include 50 patient bilateral knee osteoarthritis , admit first knee replacement surgery . Only patient older 50 year primary osteoarthritis include . The patient randomize 2 group . Intervention group receive injection 2ml Diprospan dilute 10 ml Bupivocaine . The control group receive injection 10ml Bupivocaine . All patient follow 6 week three functional rehabilitation pain score assess ( VAS pain score , Timed Up Go Score Functional Ambulatory Category Scale ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Diprospan Injection Knee Rehabilitation Patients After TKR Contralateral Knee
DOC.mesh_term: Betamethasone dipropionate , betamethasone sodium phosphate drug combination
DOC.criteria: Age old 50 Bilateral primary knee osteoarthritis Undergoing knee arthroplasty Active infection Allergy medication compound Pregnancy
